name: Pong Game (D-Studios)
description:
This is a simple project for the Game Development Club at American High School! This game is based on Pong. Move the mouse up and down to move the player paddle.
Try to score on the ball on the enemy side and prevent the ball from scoring on the player side. This game was made by Devang Bhatnagar.

Here are the links to how to create the project:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KiRiIrS5Y4B0nXqUSW1Or1VFgZp_2cHXVYrlxH0aWMM/...

https://docs.google.com/document/d/19EKtcPAijr7zcte3epK7-kNRFXqN8vq_-7TkvgQwiLc/...

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1drtiKYwer0P34di2kYxBnHX3p5XYA5FiLQpsyL3JMF4/...
